Goldman & Associates offers residents of Michigan the experienced counsel they need in matters of family, criminal and personal injury law. Our law firm is committed to providing representation focused on effectively managing each legal issue in order to reach the best possible outcome for our clients.

We recognize that people in transition due to divorce, child custody or support disputes or in the crisis of domestic violence need seasoned legal advice in order to safeguard the best interests of their families. Our law firm is well versed in promoting dispute resolution through mediation, and we help our family law clients reach amicable agreements when possible. As well as representing clients in divorce and support matters, we help individuals anticipating marriage protect their interests through prenuptial agreements.

With 24 years of legal experience, Mr. Goldman benefits his criminal law clients with attentive representation designed to defend their rights against misdemeanor or felony charges including DUI, assault and battery, weapons possession, criminal sexual conduct and fraud such as white collar crime.

Mr. Goldman has authored many legal articles and continues to serve the community, contributing legal information and education including lectures to medical institutes and an August 2010 appearance on Bloomfield Community Television's program, Practical Law.

Goldman & Associates maintains several office locations in Oakland, Wayne and Macomb counties. Serving Michigan clients in the tri-county area in cities including Sterling Heights, Detroit, Southfield, Bloomfield Hills, Mount Clemens, Warren, Farmington Hills and West Bloomfield, our law firm provides free initial phone consultations, offers counsel to Albanian, Russian and Ukrainian speaking clients, and skillfully utilizes technology to provide the best possible customer service to our clients. Contact Goldman and Associates at 248-588-3333 or toll free at 877-737-8800 to discuss your legal needs.
